properties.body:
BLACK SEA.
UKRAINE.
DNC 10.
1. UKRAINIAN COASTAL WARNING COORDINATOR HAS
   DECLARED THE FOLLOWING COASTAL APROACH
   INSTRUCTIONS FOR ENTRY OR DEPARTURE IN UKRAINIAN
   PORTS 0200Z TO 1700Z DAILY UNTIL FUTHER NOTICE.
2. ROUTES TO THE PORTS OF UKRAINE:
   A. ROUTE FOR VESSELS WITH A DRAFT OF UP TO
      EIGHT METERS WITHIN THREE MILES OF
      TRACKLINE JOINING
      45-05.00N 030-03.00E, 45-14.00N 030-01.00E,
      45-39.00N 030-05.70E, 45-47.80N 030-22.70E.
   B. ROUTE FOR VESSELS WITH A DRAFT OF
      UP TO EIGHT METERS WITHIN ONE MILE OF
      TRACKLINE JOINING
      45-47.80N 030-22.70E, 45-58.86N 030-30.79E,
      46-03.40N 030-32.60E, 46-10.81N 030-40.84E,
      46-19.84N 030-48.00E, 46-25.38N 030-53.23E.
   C. TWO-WAY ROUTE FOR VESSELS WITH DRAFT UP TO 12
      METERS WITHIN THREE MILES OF TRACKLINE JOINING
      45-05.00N 030-03.00E, 45-14.00N 030-01.00E,
      45-39.00N 030-05.70E, 46-00.00N 030-57.80E,
      46-02.80N 031-04.40E, 46-19.30N 031-04.40E,
      46-26.30N 030-53.90E.
   D. TWO-WAY ROUTE FOR VESSELS OVER 12 METERS
      DRAFT WITHIN THREE MILES OF TRACKLINE JOINING
      45-03.90N 030-18.50E, 45-33.80N 030-36.90E,
      46-00.00N 030-57.80E, 46-02.80N 031-04.40E,
      46-19.30N 031-04.40E, 46-26.30N 030-53.90E.
   E. SOUTHERN TEMPORARY WAITING AREA FOR VESSELS
      GOING TO THE PORTS OF CHORNOMORSK, ODESA,
      OR PIVDENNYI MAY BE USED TO WAIT FOR
      TRANSITING THE ROUTES DURING ALLOWED TIMES
      IN AREA BOUND BY
      45-00.00N 030-10.00E, 44-55.00N 030-25.00E,
      44-50.00N 030-25.00E, 44-50.00N 030-10.00E.
   F. NORTHERN HOLDING AREA AR 354 USED FOR SHORT
      STAYING VESSELS IN EMERGENCY CASES
      IN AREA BOUND BY
      46-29.98N 030-50.37E, 46-30.48N 030-53.90E,
      46-25.38N 030-53.90E, 46-25.38N 030-52.60E.
   G. CHORNOMORSK TO NORTHERN HOLDING AREA CHANNEL
      WITHIN 200 METERS OF TRACKLINE JOINING
      46-25.38N 030-52.60E, 46-22.00N 030-47.70E,
      46-21.55N 030-46.29E, 46-20.00N 030-42.70E,
      46-18.84N 030-41.81E, 46-19.12N 030-40.60E.
   H. ODESA TO NORTHERN HOLDING AREA CHANNEL
      WITHIN 200 METERS OF TRACKLINE JOINING
      46-30.00N 030-50.51E, 46-30.00N 030-46.40E,
      46-29.90N 030-46.04E, 46-29.99N 030-44.54E.
   I. PIVDENNYI TO NORTHERN HOLDING AREA CHANNEL
      WITHIN 200 METERS OF TRACKLINE JOINING
      46-30.48N 030-53.90E, 46-31.84N 030-53.90E,
      46-33.36N 031-00.06E, 46-36.19N 031-01.00E.
3. CANCEL HYDROLANT 603/23.
